message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to let it go for $9500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $8500 for the item. Let me know if this is within your consideration.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9200. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offers. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am comfortable offering $8800 for the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I'm willing to consider your offer, but I think I can still get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer you $9100. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. Based on my budget, I am comfortable with an offer of $8900 for the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're getting close to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'll make one more offer: $9200, and that's as low as I can go. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your last offer, but based on my budget, I am comfortable with an offer of $8950 for the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the bottom of my willingness to negotiate. I'll make one more offer: $9000, and that's as low as I can go. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but based on my budget, I am comfortable with an offer of $8900 for the item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
